Tajikistan ready for 'most important game in our history' - coach SegrtTajikistan will play their last Asian Cup group game against Lebanon like a final as the tournament debutants seek their first win and first goal, coach Petar Segrt said on Sunday. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 11:06:31 GMT FV75KVA76BKSPDPCF5EPBLVOJY https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/tajikistan-ready-most-important-game-our-history-coach-segrt-2024-01-21/Rohith Nair运动的足球
Australian Open order of play on MondayOrder of play on the main courts on the ninth day of the Australian Open on Monday (prefix number denotes seeding): Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:17:50 GMT BBFQQFWHCRI5XK3FK6Y4DMLB6A https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/australian-open-order-play-monday-2024-01-21/Reuters运动的网球
China defies sanctions to make Russia its biggest oil supplier in 2023Russia leapfrogged Saudi Arabia to become China's top crude oil supplier in 2023, data showed on Saturday, as the world's biggest crude importer defied Western sanctions to purchase vast quantities of discounted oil for its processing plants. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 03:17:10 GMT FL4AXNI5V5LY5KI6GB4X2WTS44 https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/china-defies-sanctions-make-Russia-its-biggest-oil-supplier-2023-2024-01-20/Andrew Hayley商业活力
Brazil backs Beijing's 'One China policy,' foreign minister Wang Yi saysChinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi on Friday welcomed Brazil's recent support for Beijing's "One China policy" that states Taiwan is an inseparable part of China, in a sign of stronger bilateral ties with South America's largest country. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 17:11:39 GMT FZCLBNVUOVPHNF274TRANIQSS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/brazil-backs-beijings-one-china-policy-foreign-minister-wang-yi-says-2024-01-19/Anthony Boadle世界
USDA confirms first big US soy sale to China since mid-DecemberThe U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) on Friday confirmed private sales of 297,000 metric tons of U.S. soybeans to China, the first soybean sales announcement under its daily reporting rules since Dec. 19 and the first to the world's top buyer of the oilseed since Dec. 15. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 15:49:51 GMT 5MMK6TNH7JMPHNFIBQTHHGTLMM https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/usda-confirms-first-big-us-soy-sale-china-since-mid-december-2024-01-19/Reuters市场商品
US Treasury, Chinese finance officials agree to keep meeting after Beijing talksMeetings between U.S. Treasury and Chinese financial officials in Beijing this week concluded with both sides agreeing to continue to meet regularly, the Treasury Department said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 15:00:13 GMT UP3H2Q6X3JO25JVPA5EMO4D32Q https://www.reuters.com/world/us-treasury-chinese-finance-officials-agree-keep-meeting-after-beijing-talks-2024-01-19/Reuters世界
